text: Sveti Jurij, meaning 'Saint George', sometimes abbreviated to Sv. Jurij, may refer to a number of settlements in Slovenia: * Municipality of Sveti Jurij v Slovenskih Goricah, municipality in Slovenia * Sveti Jurij, Rogatec, a settlement in the Municipality of Rogatec * Sveti Jurij, Grosuplje, a settlement in the Municipality of Grosuplje * Sveti Jurij, Rogašovci, a settlement in the Municipality of Rogašovci * Sveti Jurij ob Ščavnici, a settlement in the Municipality of Sveti Jurij ob Ščavnici * Gore, Hrastnik, a settlement in the Municipality of Hrastnik, known as Sveti Jurij ob Turju until 1955 * Jurski Vrh, a settlement in the Municipality of Kungota, known as Sveti Jurij ob Pesnici until 1952 * Podkum, a settlement in the Municipality of Zagorje ob Savi, known as Sveti Jurij pod Kumom until 1952 * Šentjur na Polju, a settlement in the Municipality of Sevnica, known as Sveti Jurij pri Loki until 1955
title: Sveti Jurij
